create.input: whakapiri, toia ranei & whakataka to waehere ki konei

errors.private_window: Kaore e taea te penapena hitori whakapiri, tera pea na te mea kei roto i te matapihi motuhake.

view.no_key: Whakapirihia te taviri ngaro kaore i hoatu
view.invalid_format: Ko te whakatakotoranga matua ngaro muhu

delete.success: Whakapiri kua mukua mai i te tūmau

require_access_code_model.header: e hiahiatia ana te waehere uru

about.title: me pehea e tiakina ai e matou to noho muna.
about.content: Ka whakamahia e Paaster te whakamunatanga mutunga-ki-te-mutunga mo te penapena me te tiri i nga whakapiri, ko te tikanga karekau e taea e te kaimau te tiro ki nga mea ka tiakina e koe ki konei.
about.source_code: Ko ta matou waehere puna he puna tuwhera katoa ka taea te arotake i runga i {github}
